calculators.popularDescription: The most requested and used tools by our visitors daily.

water_usage.title: Water Usage Calculator
water_usage.description: Estimate your daily water consumption at home and receive conservation tips.
water_usage.shower_tooltip: Average time spent in the shower
water_usage.toilet_tooltip: How many times you flush the toilet per day
water_usage.dish_tooltip: Times dishes are washed manually or by machine
water_usage.laundry_tooltip: Number of laundry loads per week
water_usage.cost_tooltip: Water price per liter based on local tariff
water_usage.comparison_low: Your water usage is low and ideal.
water_usage.comparison_average: Your usage is within the normal average per individual.
water_usage.comparison_high: Your usage is high. Try using water-saving devices.
water_usage.info_description: Water is a precious and limited resource. Conserving usage protects the environment and reduces your monthly bills.
water_usage.use_case_1: Take shorter showers and install water-saving showerheads.
water_usage.use_case_2: Fix leaks promptly and use water-efficient appliances.
water_usage.use_case_3: Water plants early morning or late evening to reduce evaporation.
water_usage.error_at_least_one: Please enter at least one value

tree_planting.title: Tree Planting Impact Calculator
tree_planting.description: Calculate the environmental impact of planting trees including CO₂ offset, oxygen production, and ecosystem benefits.
tree_planting.trees_tooltip: How many trees you plan to plant or have planted
tree_planting.age_tooltip: How old the trees are or will be
tree_planting.type_tooltip: Different tree types have different CO₂ absorption rates
tree_planting.formula_explanation: Trees absorb CO₂ through photosynthesis, produce oxygen, filter water, prevent erosion, and provide habitat for wildlife. A single mature tree can absorb 21 kg of CO₂ per year.
tree_planting.info_description: Trees are nature's carbon capture technology. They absorb CO₂, produce oxygen, cool the environment, filter water, and support biodiversity.
tree_planting.use_case_1: Combat climate change by removing CO₂ from the atmosphere
tree_planting.use_case_2: Improve air quality and reduce urban heat islands
tree_planting.use_case_3: Provide habitat for wildlife and preserve biodiversity
tree_planting.error_required: Please enter the number of trees and their age

categoryDescriptions.math: Solve complex mathematical problems easily, from algebra to calculus.
categoryDescriptions.finance: Tools for financial planning, loan calculations, taxes, and investments.
categoryDescriptions.health: Track your health through BMI calculators, calories, and nutritional needs.

categoryDescriptions.physics: Accurate physics calculations for mechanics, electricity, and energy.
categoryDescriptions.engineering: Specialized tools for engineers and designers.
categoryDescriptions.education: Educational tools to help students in their studies.
categoryDescriptions.date-time: Calculate time differences and convert between different calendars.
categoryDescriptions.misc: A variety of useful tools for different daily needs.
categoryDescriptions.geometry: Calculate areas, volumes, and various geometric shapes.
categoryDescriptions.business: Tools for business management, profit calculation, and productivity.
categoryDescriptions.construction: Calculators for construction projects, material estimation, and costs.
categoryDescriptions.automotive: Everything you need for your car from fuel consumption to trip costs.
categoryDescriptions.cooking: Convert cooking ingredients and adjust recipe quantities.
categoryDescriptions.gaming: Tools and calculators dedicated to gaming and entertainment.
categoryDescriptions.agriculture: Farm calculations, irrigation, and crop planning.
categoryDescriptions.science: Advanced scientific tools for various research fields.
categoryDescriptions.electrical: Calculations for electrical circuits, power, and voltage.
categoryDescriptions.astronomy: Explore space with distance and celestial body calculators.
categoryDescriptions.statistics: Tools for data analysis and mathematical statistics.
categoryDescriptions.real-estate: Mortgage calculations, ROI, and property values.
categoryDescriptions.fitness: Tools to improve your physical fitness and track your workouts.
categoryDescriptions.environmental: Calculate your environmental footprint and contribute to sustainability.
categoryDescriptions.pet: Everything you need to care for your pets.
